alert.note: Alert for Lake (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:47PM EDT until June 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LAKE COUNTY... At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Griffin, moving southeast at 10 mph. At 345 PM, a wind gust of 56 mph was reported at the Leesburg Airport. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake and Mount Dora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Melbourne. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
